20101227165801.000|20101227165803.000|TR0|NEW HORIZON WINES:  Entering any market 
20101227165803.000|20101227165806.000|TR0|with a new product is an uphill battle.  
20101227165806.000|20101227165808.000|TR0|That, you know, don't shy away from that.  
20101227165808.000|20101227165811.000|TR0|The fact is the U.K. market is the single 
20101227165811.000|20101227165814.000|TR0|largest importer of wine in the world.  
20101227165814.000|20101227165816.000|TR0|Yes, it is a complicated market but the 
20101227165816.000|20101227165819.000|TR0|U.K. wine consumer generally is an 
20101227165819.000|20101227165821.000|TR0|exploratory wine consumer.
20101227165821.000|20101227165824.000|TR0|
20101227165824.000|20101227165826.000|TR0|BOLDEN:  Parker recently took Virginia 
20101227165826.000|20101227165829.000|TR0|Wines to Paris and he says it got a thumbs 
20101227165829.000|20101227165832.000|TR0|up from the French wine media.  And he 
20101227165832.000|20101227165834.000|TR0|says new wines benefit from one drink (ph) 
20101227165834.000|20101227165837.000|TR0|shared between young drinkers, whether in 
20101227165837.000|20101227165839.000|TR0|London, Paris, or New York.
20101227165839.000|20101227165842.000|TR0|
20101227165842.000|20101227165845.000|TR0|PARKER:  The younger wine consumers, say 
20101227165845.000|20101227165847.000|TR0|in their 20s, 30s, are interested in 
20101227165847.000|20101227165850.000|TR0|learning more about wine.  It's not just 
20101227165850.000|20101227165852.000|TR0|grabbing a bottle of wine off a

20101227165857.000|20101227165900.000|TR0|BOLDEN:  Virginia hopes wine tourism will

20101227165905.000|20101227165908.000|TR0|Back at Ridgview, the Roberts family will

20101227165910.000|20101227165913.000|TR0|their sparkling wine brings any American
